trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration for a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 定義安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的組態。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement STSs derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別可實作 Sts <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇從目前的組態載入的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>從組態檔; 載入設定否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別具有指定的簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: 如果`issuerName`是`null`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別具有指定的簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇從目前的組態載入的設定。

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: 如果`issuerName`是`null`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>從組態檔; 載入設定否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別具有指定的簽發者名稱和簽章憑證。

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: 如果`issuerName`是`null`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: STS 簽署憑證。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別具有指定的簽發者名稱和簽章憑證。

trans-unit.source: Optionally loads settings from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇從目前的組態載入的設定。

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: 如果`issuerName`是`null`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: STS 簽署憑證。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>從組態檔; 載入設定否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> class that has the specified issuer name and signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref>類別具有指定的簽發者名稱和簽章憑證。

trans-unit.source: Settings are loaded from the specified named configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的具名組態載入設定。

trans-unit.source: If `issuerName` is `null`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A> property must be set before the security token service is used to create a token.
trans-unit.target: 如果`issuerName`是`null`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性必須設定後，安全性權杖服務用來建立語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TokenIssuerName*>

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the STS.
trans-unit.target: STS 簽署憑證。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SigningCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from which the configuration is to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref>從中位於要載入其組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an security token service (STS) instance from the <xref:System.Type> specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> property.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性權杖服務 (STS) 執行個體從<xref:System.Type>中所指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The class specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A> property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A>屬性必須實作採用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>型別參數的建構函式</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService%2A>的類別

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type> specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> property.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Type>中所指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.SecurityTokenService*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default key size limit in bits used check if the KeySize specified in the request is within this limit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中使用位元的核取的預設索引鍵大小限制，如果要求中指定的 KeySize 位於這項限制。

trans-unit.source: This only applies to the symmetric key case.
trans-unit.target: 這只適用於的對稱金鑰的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The default key size limit, in bits.
trans-unit.target: 預設索引鍵大小限制，以位元。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1024.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1024年。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default key size in bits used in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定核發之權杖中所使用的位元的預設金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: This only applies to the symmetric key case.
trans-unit.target: 這只適用於的對稱金鑰的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The key size used in the issued token, in bits.
trans-unit.target: 使用核發之權杖中，以位元的金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 256.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 256。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default lifetime used in the issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定核發的權杖中使用的預設存留時間。

trans-unit.source: The default lifetime to use in issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在中使用的預設存留時間發出的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 day.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1 天。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default token type that is used in token issuance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設的權杖類型，可在權杖發行。

trans-unit.source: The string values are specified in URI format; for example, for the SAML 1.1 token type, the following is the string value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1.
trans-unit.target: URI 格式; 所指定的字串值例如，SAML 1.1 權杖類型，以下是字串值︰ http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1。

trans-unit.source: The default token type is set to SAML 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 預設的語彙基元型別設定為 SAML 1.1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the default token type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含預設的權杖類型。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空白。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not defined in the token handlers.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值未定義在語彙基元處理常式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether WSDL generation should be enabled for the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否應該啟用 WSDL 產生安全性權杖服務 (STS)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable WSDL generation for the STS; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用 WSDL 產生的 STS;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定發行之權杖的最大權杖存留期。

trans-unit.source: The maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
trans-unit.target: 發出的權杖最大權杖存留期。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 day.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1 天。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Type>的安全性權杖服務 (STS)。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The class specified in the SecurityTokenService property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: SecurityTokenService 屬性中指定的類別必須實作接受類型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>參數的建構函式

trans-unit.source: The type of the security token service.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖服務的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type must derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 類型必須衍生自<xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not assignable as <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是指派為<xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定簽署憑證。

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: 簽署的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the issuer name so that it can be set in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定簽發者名稱使它可以設定核發之權杖中。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字串，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust 1.3 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Ws-trust 1.3 要求 (RST) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust 1.3 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust 1.3 要求 (RST) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust 1.3 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Ws-trust 1.3 回應 (RSTR) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust 1.3 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust 1.3 回應 (RSTR) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust Feb 2005 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Ws-trust Feb 2005 要求 (RST) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Feb 2005 Request (RST) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust Feb 2005 要求 (RST) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Trust Feb 2005 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Ws-trust Feb 2005 回應 (RSTR) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Feb 2005 Response (RSTR) serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust Feb 2005 回應 (RSTR) 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
